note:
“I will believe in myself! / This is the only start for me…”

black-furred domestic housecat with a body made of flames (that is, a catflame), with white pawsocks and deeply yellow eyes
except during spookmonth—then im batcat!!
queer, nonbinary, genderfluid, non-passing, catflame political pan-lesbian; big fan of androgyny, and also twinks. they/them, she/her; please use both!
in my mid 20s.
not currently in a place to start any new capital-R–Relationships.

sometimes wears a dragon costume, sometimes just a catdragon. sometimes also a a robot (always a cyborg). reportedly a Mew. may take the form of a caterpiller pokémon that they made up.

weird and broken and working through trauma. very anti-ableist (but in practice that means i’ll probably just ignore you). i play semi-competitive Brawl in 2019.

unless i specifically say otherwise, boostable posts are okay to boost. my follow requests are fairly open.
my bio is fluid and so am i.

i probably love cats more than you do.

. hi! you can call me ’leftie, or Eel—though i am not an eel! i’m a domestic housecat made entirely of fire!—, and you could probably call me by other names too||
(sometimes though i’m a very fluffy catdragon!!)

. i’m some kind of queer nonbinary genderfluid (pan) lesbian, a genderfucky sort of woman
(what the fuck is gender.)

. i like to play '|smash|' games at a competitive level, and am actively critical of its competitive communities
i might be kind of good at it sometimes

. i am a singlet, but i enjoy using monsterfork’s signature functionality to say my posts were cat noises

. my bio changes frequently
